Once this effect is triggered, you will not gain Sigils of Rebellion for 20s. Of the many effects of the "Millennial Movement," buffs of the same type will not stack.

Upon causing an Overloaded, Superconduct, Electro-Charged, Quicken, Aggravate, Hyperbloom, or Electro-infused Swirl reaction, ATK is increased by 20% for 12s.

Overloaded
Upon causing an Overloaded, Superconduct, Electro-Charged, Quicken, Aggravate, Hyperbloom, or Electro-infused Swirl reaction, ATK is increased by 40% for 12s.

name: Fillet Blade
description:
Gash
On hit, has a 50% chance to deal 240% ATK DMG to a single opponent. Can only occur once every 15s.

Gash
On hit, has a 50% chance to deal 400% ATK DMG to a single target. Can only occur once every 11s.

name: Skyrider Sword
description:
Determination
Using an Elemental Burst grants a 12% increase in ATK and Movement SPD for 15s.

Determination
Using an Elemental Burst grants a 24% increase in ATK and Movement SPD for 15s.

name: Ferrous Shadow
description:
Unbending
When HP falls below 70%, increases Charged Attack DMG by 30% and Charged Attacks become harder to interrupt.

Unbending
When HP falls below 90%, increases Charged Attack DMG by 50% and Charged Attacks become harder to interrupt.

name: Bloodtainted Greatsword
description:
Bane of Fire and Thunder
Increases DMG dealt against opponents affected by Pyro or Electro by 12%.

Bane of Fire and Thunder
Increases DMG against opponents affected by Pyro or Electro by 24%.

name: White Iron Greatsword
description:
Cull the Weak
Defeating an opponent restores 8% HP.

Cull the Weak
Defeating an opponent restores 16% HP.

name: Debate Club
description:
Blunt Conclusion
After using an Elemental Skill, on hit, Normal and Charged Attacks deal additional DMG equal to 60% of ATK in a small AoE. Effect lasts 15s. DMG can only occur once every 3s.

Blunt Conclusion
After using an Elemental Skill, on hit, Normal and Charged Attacks deal additional DMG equal to 120% of ATK in a small AoE. Effect lasts 15s. DMG can only occur once every 3s.

name: Skyrider Greatsword
description:
Courage
On hit, Normal or Charged Attacks increase ATK by 6% for 6s. Max 4 stacks. Can occur once every 0.5s.

Courage
On hit, Normal or Charged Attacks increase ATK by 10% for 6s. Max 4 stacks. Can occur once every 0.5s.

name: White Tassel
description:
Sharp
Increases Normal Attack DMG by 24%.

Sharp
Increases Normal Attack DMG by 48%.

name: Halberd
description:
Heavy
Normal Attacks deal an additional 160% ATK as DMG. Can only occur once every 10s.

Heavy
Normal Attacks deal an additional 320% ATK as DMG. This effect can only occur once every 10s.

name: Black Tassel
description:
Bane of the Soft
Increases DMG against slimes by 40%.

Bane of the Soft
Increases DMG against slimes by 80%.

name: Magic Guide
description:

Increases DMG against opponents affected by Hydro or Electro by 12%.

Bane of Storm and Tide
Increases DMG against opponents affected by Hydro or Electro by 24%.

name: Thrilling Tales of Dragon Slayers
description:
Heritage
When switching characters, the new character taking the field has their ATK increased by 24% for 10s. This effect can only occur once every 20s.

Heritage
When switching characters, the new character taking the field has their ATK increased by 48% for 10s. This effect can only occur once every 20s.

name: Otherworldly Story
description:
Energy Shower
Picking up an Elemental Energy Orb/Particle recovers 1% HP.

Energy Shower
Each Elemental Orb or Particle collected restores 2% HP.

name: Emerald Orb
description:
Rapids
Upon causing a Vaporize, Electro-Charged, Frozen, Bloom, or a Hydro-infused Swirl reaction, increases ATK by 20% for 12s.

Rapids
Upon causing a Vaporize, Electro-Charged, Frozen, Bloom, or a Hydro-infused Swirl reaction, increases ATK by 40% for 12s.

name: Twin Nephrite
description:
Guerilla Tactics
Defeating an opponent increases Movement SPD and ATK by 12% for 15s.

Guerilla Tactics

name: Raven Bow
description:
Bane of Flame and Water
Increases DMG against opponents affected by Hydro or Pyro by 12%.

description:
Precise
Increases DMG against weak spots by 24%.

Precise
Increases DMG against weak spots by 48%.

name: Recurve Bow
description:
Cull the Weak
Defeating an opponent restores 8% HP.

Cull the Weak
Defeating an opponent restores 16% HP.

name: Slingshot
description:
Slingshot
If a Normal or Charged Attack hits a target within 0.3s of being fired, increases DMG by 36%. Otherwise, decreases DMG by 10%.

Slingshot
If a Normal or Charged Attack hits a target within 0.3s of being fired, increases DMG by 60%. Otherwise, decreases DMG by 10%.

name: Messenger
description:

Charged Attack hits on weak points deal an additional 100% ATK DMG as CRIT DMG. Can only occur once every 10s.
